original_title: 空飛ぶ円盤恐怖の襲撃
overview: A 1956 alien invasion tokusatsu film directed by Shinichi Sekizawa, the screenwriter noted for his immense contributions to Toho's Godzilla series by providing the screenplays/stories for the majority of the original Showa films.
title: Fearful Attack of the Flying Saucers
